detaileddescription.para: Whether transaction reconciliation protocol should be enabled by default.
Default number of non-mempool transactions to keep around for block reconstruction. Includes orphan, replaced, and rejected transactions.
Maximum number of outstanding CMPCTBLOCK requests for the same block.
Number of headers sent in one getheaders result. We rely on the assumption that if a peer sends less than this number, we reached its tip. Changing this value is a protocol upgrade.
